com.snakybo.torch.object

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.object.TorchObject
      • com.snakybo.torch.object.GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class GameObject
extends TorchObject

    The GameObject.

    All objects visible in the scene are GameObjects. A GameObject consists of one or multiple Components.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public final <T extends Component> T addComponent(java.lang.Class<T> component)

        Add a Component to the GameObject.

        Type Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getComponent

        public final <T extends Component> T getComponent(java.lang.Class<T> type)

        Attempt to retrieve a component of type from the GameObject.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the component to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of component to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The component, or null if no component of type was found.

      • getComponents

        public final <T extends Component> java.lang.Iterable<T> getComponents(java.lang.Class<T> type)

        Attempt to retrieve all components of type from the GameObject.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the component to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of component to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The components, it's empty if no components of type are found.

        Get the Transform attached to this GameObject.

        The Transform attached to this GameObject
